protocol.name: P-MTAB-18458
protocol.text: Signal values were normalized using the gcRMA method with Bioconductor package in R. ata of the resulting FGEM file is represented in a log2-scale.

protocol.name: P-MTAB-18459
text: plants were grown for 7 days (2days of germination, 5 days of growth) vertically under continuous light conditions at 21ﾰC with 1x Murashige and Skoog medium (4.302 g/L), 10 g/L sucrose, 0.1 g/L myo-inositol, 0.5 g/L MES, 100 ?L thiamine hydrochloride (10 mg/mL), 100 ?L pyridoxine (5 mg/mL), 100 ?L nicotinic acid (5 mg/mL), pH 5.7 adjusted with 1 M KOH, 10 g/L agar. Seeds were put out on a nylon mesh (20 ?m pore size) (Prosep).
(Parameters: start time = 5, time unit = days, min temperature = 21, temperature unit = C)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-18460
text: Root tips were cut and preserved at -70ﾰC. After grinding of the samples, RNA was extracted with Trizol reagent and purified with RNeasy kit (Qiagen)

protocol.name: P-MTAB-18461
protocol.text: Membranes were transferred to 1xMS medium, supplemented with 2mM HU for the designated amount of time (0h, 5h, 24h)
